  • Method Details

    • getAllManufacturers

      @GetMapping public List<Manufacturer> getAllManufacturers()
      Get all manufacturers from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all Manufacturer entities available in the database.

    • createManufacturer

      @PostMapping public Manufacturer createManufacturer(@RequestBody Manufacturer manufacturer)
      Create a new manufacturer and save it to the database.
      Parameters:
      manufacturer - The Manufacturer object to be created and saved.
      Returns:
      The newly created Manufacturer entity with its ID assigned.

    • getManufacturerById

      @GetMapping("{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Manufacturer> getManufacturerById(@PathVariable long id)
      Retrieve a manufacturer from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the manufacturer to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the Manufacturer entity if found, or 404 Not Found if the manufacturer does not exist.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the manufacturer with the specified ID does not exist.

    • updateManufacturer

      @PutMapping("{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Manufacturer> updateManufacturer(@PathVariable long id, @RequestBody Manufacturer manufacturerProperties)
      Update an existing manufacturer's details in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the manufacturer to be updated.
      manufacturerProperties - The Manufacturer object containing the updated properties.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the updated Manufacturer entity if found, or 404 Not Found if the manufacturer does not exist.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the manufacturer with the specified ID does not exist.

    • deleteManufacturer

      @DeleteMapping("{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.http.HttpStatus> deleteManufacturer(@PathVariable long id)
      Delete a manufacturer from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the manufacturer to be deleted.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with status NO_CONTENT if the manufacturer is successfully deleted.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the manufacturer with the specified ID does not exist.
